termination_clause.text: TERMINATION.8.1 TERM.  The term of this Agreement shall continue forone (1) year following the Launch Date, unless earlierterminated as provided herein. This Agreement may berenewed for any number of successive one (1)year terms by mutual written agreement ofthe parties prior to the conclusion of theterm of this Agreement.  A party wishing torenew this Agreement shall give the otherparty notice thereof no less than thirty(30) days before the expiration of the termthen in effect.  In the event that eitherparty does not give such notice, the term ofthis Agreement shall be automaticallyrenewed for another one (1) year.Source: 2THEMART COM INC, 10-12G, 8/26/1999 8.2 TERMINATION FOR BREACH.
